subTitle: Consider when providing material that:
genericGuidanceItem1: you can upload letters, photos or documents to support your response
genericGuidanceItem2: if you are taking a picture of a letter, place it on a flat surface and take the picture from above
genericGuidanceItem3: if you are uploading written documents with tracked changes, make sure that tracked changes are turned on
boxLabel: Use this box to provide any supporting material. You can also upload a file if you wish.

responseText.required: Use the text box or file upload to give details
responseText.tooLong: Give details (free text) must be entered as 2500 characters or less

supportingMaterialFile.invalidFileName: The name of the file provided is invalid. A file name cannot exceed 150 characters or contain any of the following characters: \/:*?"|<>
supportingMaterialFile.invalidFileSize: The file you are trying to upload has exceeded the maximum file size limit, please reduce the size of the file.
supportingMaterialFile.backEndError: There was an error uploading your file. Please try again. If this error persists please contact support.
